short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draw and share graffiti on any website - Express yourself freely on the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash your inner artist on every webpage you visit! We Are All Banksy transforms any site into a virtual canvas where you can draw and doodle. Anyone else with this extension installed will see your creations—just like a shared graffiti wall on the internet.

Key Features
	•	Draw & Doodle Anywhere: Add a floating canvas atop any website to create sketches, scribbles, or even little notes.
	•	Real-Time Sharing: Others using the extension can immediately view your artwork—turn the web into a collaborative art space.
	•	No Sign-Up Needed: Jump right in without creating an account. Your doodles are saved and shared anonymously.
	•	Lightweight & Intuitive: Easy-to-use interface, minimal impact on browsing speed.

How It Works
	1.	Install the Extension: Click “Add to Chrome” and enable the extension.
	2.	Open a Webpage: Navigate to any site you want.
	3.	Start Drawing: Click the extension icon or use the provided toolbar to begin doodling.
	4.	Share the Fun: Anyone with “We Are All Banksy” sees your creations in real time.

Why “We Are All Banksy”?

I believe in bringing creativity and spontaneity to the web. Inspired by street art’s ability to unite strangers in a shared space, this extension invites everyone to leave their mark—no matter how big or small.

Start turning the internet into a global canvas—because we are all artists, we are all Banksy!
